Key Match Events: Mohammad Rizwan and Babar Azam formed a decisive second-wicket partnership of 139
Ireland's total of 178 for 7 was built around a second-wicket partnership of 85 from 49 balls between Andy Balbirnie and Lorcan Tucker
Shaheen Shah Afridi produced a superb spell of three for 14 from four overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan responded from losing the opening match of the series to take it 2-1
Others: Harry Tector's 30 produced late defiance for Ireland
